--- rename_table_single.sql
RENAME TABLE Singers TO Artists
--- AST
&ast.RenameTable{
  Rename: 0,
  Tos:    []*ast.RenameTableTo{
    &ast.RenameTableTo{
      Old: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 20,
        Name:    "Singers",
      },
      New: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 24,
        NameEnd: 31,
        Name:    "Artists",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
RENAME TABLE Singers TO Artists
